DOC.brief_summary: Eligible subject chronic neck pain randomly allocate one two intervention group : real v control spinal manipulation . They receive three intervention session . H1 : Chronic neck pain patient treat longitudinally series three encounter one week random assignment treatment group either dual delivery procedure ( Intervention 1=typical-control Intervention 2=control-control ) 50 % error rate self-report group allocation exit interview . H2 : Patients treat typical-control dual procedure typical sequence encounter ( 3 time one week ) show statistically significant improvement clinical outcome ; define quantitatively visual analogue pain scale ( VAS ) , Neck Disability Index ( NDI ) , range motion pressure algometry ; compare treat control-control dual procedure . H3 : Patients stratify ' priori ' patient expectation treatment outcome show significant difference self-report group allocation clinical outcome measure . A total 372 subject recruit .
DOC.criteria: Male Female 21 60 year age Chronic neck pain Neck pain duration great 6 week Numeric Rating Scale great 30 , less 65 Pain distribution nuchal ridge spine scapula Pain aggravate local provocation maneuver single motion segment Anteroposterior glide Paraspinal tenderness Negative provocative maneuver adjacent segment Able tolerate neck movement 50 percent normal direction Worker 's compensation medicolegal claim Cervical spine surgery fracture dislocation Uncontrolled hypertension ( Blood Pressure 140 90 ) Stroke Transient Ischemic Attack Upper respiratory infection within 4 week Severe degenerative disease cervical spine New significantly alter pattern headache complaint Connective tissue disease Primary fibromyalgia Metabolic metaplastic bone disease Whiplash injury within 12 month High cholesterol level wellmanaged medically Cardiovascular surgery past 6 month plan Use narcotic analgesic , prescription antiinflammatory , muscle relaxant , anticonvulsant Angina pectoris Dizziness Tinnitus Blurred vision , vertigo , undiagnosed sensory motor disturbance Radicular symptom sign Current use anticoagulant therapy Upper respiratory infection Neck pain provocation great 7 10 Provocation radicular pain sensory disturbance Hypermobility multiple peripheral joint , Physical mental impairment preclude follow instruction participate supine recumbent posture
